Description: Untitled Document RARE! 20s Antique GRUEN Guild 885 CUSHION ART DECO SWISS WATCH MEN 14K GF I am pleased to offer this extremely rare, nicely preserved and restored GRUEN in cushion shaped, Art Deco model from the late 20s with amazing design, this is a real classic. Ready to gift, wear or add to your collection! Movement: State of the art GRUEN Swiss manual wind movement. This is a fine large 885 Guild caliber, running well on 15 jewels. The movement is working well and clean, keeping good time. Case, Crystal & Crown: Original and signed GRUEN Wadsworth 14K WHITE gold filled case in overall very good shape with classic cushion design. With good crown and mint correct mineral crystal. Dial & Hands : 100% ORIGINAL FACTORY MADE Sterling silver dial with hard enamel print. This is THE original dial from the factory, it is not refinished. The dial has had its radium luminous material removed as originally it contained hazardious radioactive substance. Instead Super-Luminova with simulated radium-tone was manually applied on the original design and now the dial is glowing nicely in the dark and hazard-free! With original set of hands. Tip for collectors: Despite popular demand for refinished clean dials, I am aware of collectors' search and sensitivity for original dials. Therefore any dials known to be refinished, will be clearly mentioned in the dial section of the description. Otherwise, dial is believed to be 100% original. Size: Measures 27 mm side to side (excluding crown) and 35 mm lug to lug. Vintage watches are often smaller than watches common nowadays; To avoid inconvenience, Please take a moment to examine the size and make sure it meets your expectations and wrist size. Band: Equipped with a brand new TIMEPIECE quality genuine leather band, padded black, 16 mm wide. Please keep in mind that due to the nature of these mechanical watches and their early age, although I fully stand behind my description, I can't guarantee perfect time accuracy. Photos are considered a part of the description. Shipping and handling - Worldwide flat rate: DHL Express door-to-door - 48.00 $US Expected delivery in 3 business days. Tracking available online. This is a signed for and fully insured express service. Once payment is made, I will send a confirmation email with expected date of shipping. I ship in 48 hours from clearance of funds, or earlier. Payments for items: Payments are strictly expected within 5 days of end of auction, unless a prior arrangement is agreed upon. Please be advised that I often sell for other people and need to pay them according to the final bid; I therefore expect the payment to be made in a timely manner and reserve the right to relist items that are not paid within 5 days of end of auction, without prior notice. My preffered method of payment is . Buyers from Israel: We are a registered LTD. company, and issue commercial invoices to all items; Please be advised that all winning bids shipped within Israel will have 16% VAT added, no exceptions. Customs, local taxes and extra fees: Please be advised that any tax, customs fees, transit fees and release fees that may be imposed on the parcel by any authority are the sole repsonsibility of the buyer. Buyers are required to check their local policies in country of destination and bid accordingly. I will honor all 'customs declaration' a buyer will request but the final responsibility for any additional cost is on the buyer, should any costs arise. One last thing...Bid with confidence! Please take a moment to look at my feedback, plenty of personal remarks about the quality of my items, their accurate description and quick, reliable shipping.. I take a great pride in my customer service and high seller ratings and proud to take part in ebay's 'Valuable Sellers' exclusive program. Rest assured that what you see is what you get, authentic and in good condition as listed, sometimes even better! In the very rare event of a problem, Please do not hesitate to let me know about it, I will do my best to meet your full satisfaction.
